author: Ca\303\261ete, Daniel, Daza Navarro, Mar\303\255a Paula, Y\303\272fera Garc\303\255a, Alberto
title: A Microelectrode-Cell Sensor Model for Real Time Monitoring
abstract: In this paper the application of a cellmicroelectrode model to cell biometry experiments is proposed, using the cell-electrode area overlap as main parameter. The model can be applied to cell size identification, cell count, and their extension to cell growth and dosimetry protocols. Experimental results using AA8 cell line are presented, obtaining promising results.Ministerio de Ciencia e Innovaci\303\263n de Espa\303\261a y FEDER (Uni\303\263n Europea) P0-TIC-5386Departamento de Biolog\303\255a Celular, Facultad de Biolog\303\255a, Universidad de Sevilla
